segments.text: Sam , can we stop at this bicycle shop ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Do you want to buy a new bicycle ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yes , and they have a sale on now .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: What happened to your old one ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I left it at my parent's house , but I need one here as well . I've been using Jim's old bike but he needs it back .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Look at this mountain bike . It is only £ 330 . Do you like it ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I prefer something like this one - a touring bike , but it is more expensive .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The price on the tag says £ 565 but maybe you can get a discount .
segments.speaker: S2
